appDescription.message: Simply track bra prices across any sellers
appDescription.description: A description of the extension displayed in the web store.

shareTitle.message: Bratags is the best way to track bra prices!

shareDescription.message: The Bratags Chromium extension make is simple to track bra prices.

shareQuote.message: Bratags for the LOwest bra prices.

BBra2.message: You're the first to tag <sup>(track)</sup> this bra.

BBra3.message: When you click tag, Bratags will do the heavy lifting and continually track changes, build a visualization graph, and notify you if the price matches your set price.

BTagNotify2.message: The value does not appear to be a valid $locale$ currency value.

BTagNotify3.message: Please enter the price at which you would like to be notified.

BBra4.message: While you can still create notices, you will not receive notifications until you update your preferences.

BUnknownRule2a.message: Please limit your note to 500 characters.
